title: What was your method of cheating on the exams? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cheating is easy. All you need to do is to Study so hard that the test examiners can use your script to grade others. You will so excel that he or she will think his examinations have been compromised ! Be more determined to pass than fail.Study with colleagues so that you can also know what they know. If they don't know much, you can teach them also. You will know better by that means.Looks for tricks and tips that only you will know. The use of mnemonics is perfect. They can help you memorise wisely.GXUVIMR - Electromagnetic spectrum. Gamma rays, X-rays, Ultraviole rays, Visible ,Infra-red, Microwave and Radio wave. Knowing it as GXUVIMR is alot safer than scribbling it into the examination hall! Use flash cards and make notes of key areas or points before the test. Keep them everywhere. They will ‘stick’. Discard them before the examination. Practice hard before you go for the test. Then set questions for yourself. Be hard on yourself. You will excel in the test. No more need to cheat!Spying from your friends is a let down. Making uses of foreign materials to help you in the examination is illegal and not dignifying. If you must ‘cheat’, employ the techniques above.

When I look back today, memories make me smile, grades do not !! - Dr. Kalam Counted in the sincere students in school,I found it against my ethics to cheat  I still remember , it was class VII, Science exam, 3 different answer sheets, PCB… Chemistry it was  I never felt so horrified after seeing the question paper, I immediately looked back towards my friend with a small tear droplet in my eye  She just smiled back and her words gave me the confidence to commit this sin called cheating very happily, “I will take care” she said. By chance, the circumstances were in our favor, we got an invigilator who was very easy to handle, although I had to be much cautious all the time as my mother was a teacher in the same school and I had to take utmost care of her respect. I somehow managed to exchange the answer sheet through the aisle near the benches. Twist : I got the highest in Chemistry But that was the first and last time, I cheated in some exam.
